name: Lab Escape (heartofacid)
description:
Overview

Play as an angry man who was drawn in less than 10 seconds, and find a way out of the Lab to find whoever did this to him.

Goal

Find the key card and Escape the Lab, but watch out for goo, and keep an eye out for free pills.

Gameplay

Platform up the lab and scavenge of all the free pills you can before you escape, but you also need to find the key card if even plan on escaping, but it won't be as easy as it sounds, due to some mysterious red goo.
